name: view-columns-update-500
description: views columns update endpoint returns 500 error (NocoDB server-side bug)
symptoms: Cannot hide/show individual columns via API
hypotheses: NocoDB v2 API bug in self-hosted community edition
API may have changed in recent NocoDB versions
workaround: Use views columns hide-all / show-all which work correctly, or use NocoDB UI

name: export-error-missing-status-code
description: NocoDBAPIError raised without required status_code in export_view(), causes TypeError at runtime
symptoms: TypeError when export job fails or times out
hypotheses: status_code param was added to exception class after export code was written

name: export-print-error-missing-json
description: Export command does not pass as_json to print_error, breaking JSON output on errors
symptoms: nocodb export --json outputs plain text errors instead of JSON
Inconsistent error format compared to all other commands
hypotheses: as_json parameter was overlooked when export command was added
